MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Mill Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.52am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair we now require further resource on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.57pm on Monday 23rd November 2020.
